pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, September 29, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, September 29, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will depart to Jerusalem to attend the funeral for former Israeli Prime Minister and President, Shimon Peres.

Canada Reception Center
Hangar 11
190 Convair Private,
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 7:15 a.m.
  • Photo opportunity only

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
